message: Bob, I'm happy to offer you this incredible product at a price that reflects its significant value. I'm starting at $1,750,000, but I'm open to discussing a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to offer $1,300,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,300,000 simply doesn't reflect the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,550,000. This price is still fair, considering the product's worth to you. I'm confident we can find a solution that benefits us both.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $1,200,000 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
